scripts.cdk-ls: cross-env ODMD_build_id=OdmdBuildUserAuth ODMD_rev_ref=b..main cdk ls --profile sandbox-workspace1
scripts.cdk-sa: cross-env ODMD_build_id=OdmdBuildUserAuth ODMD_rev_ref=b..main cdk synth * --profile sandbox-workspace1
scripts.cdk-sac: cross-env ODMD_build_id=OdmdBuildUserAuth ODMD_rev_ref=b..main cdk deploy OdmdBuildUserAuth--main --exclusively --method prepare-change-set --require-approval never --profile sandbox-workspace1
